item.title: Variety to Honor 10 Artisans to Watch at SCAD Savannah Film Festival
item.description: Variety will publish its fourth annual 10 Artisans to Watch list on Oct. 22 and recognize the honorees at this year’s SCAD Savannah Film Festival. As Variety continues to elevate artisans in its cover
